newsitem.title: TAIWAN: PRESS DIGEST - Taiwan newspapers - May 8.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Taiwan newspapers - May 8.

text.p: These are the leading stories in the Taiwan press on Thursday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
CHINA TIMES - President Lee Teng-hui orders cabinet reshuffle and focus on improving social order
-- Democratic Progressive Party lawmakers to propose a vote of lack of confidence in cabinet
UNITED DAILY NEWS - Nationalist Party proposes two-stage cabinet reshuffle
-- Democratic Progressive Party, New Party to join force in demanding replacement of premier
LIBERTY TIMES - Premier Lien Chan resigns, but asked by President Lee to stay on
COMMERCIAL TIMES - Cabinet to be reshuffled next week; interior minister, agriculture council chairman to be replaced
-- Land values in 21 cities and counties in Taiwan declared 6.33 pct higher than 1996's
ECONOMIC DAILY NEWS - Central bank not to tighen fund liquidity
-- Taiwan suffers trade deficit in April
